###Clouvider is now 7 years old! 
As we continue to grow we wanted to give our valued & new customers a chance to grow with us - Get an additional 7% recurring off our dedicated servers using voucher code "HAPPY7TH".

**What sets us apart?**
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (3.7+ Tbps Total Capacity) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at Equinix IX London, AMS-IX, DE-CIX, Digital Realty IX, DE-CIX NY, Any2 IX, Digital Realty IX & Community IX Atlanta to local ISP’s and private peering directly with Liberty Global and Google.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA and Cogent which guarantees excellent, congestion free connectivity
-LINX, LONAP and AMS-IX partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-Cross Continent MPLS Network Spread over 11 data centres.
-Tier 3 Data centres in Los Angeles, Atlanta, New York City, London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-Value added services included; [free DirectAdmin licensing](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/software-licensing/directadmin/), complimentary [best effort DDoS protection](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/ddos-protection/), free Acronis 50GB offsite backup for internal services.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established, growing, 7 year old UK based business. 

Additional offers below and on our servers sale page.

**FAQ’s:**

_Can these servers be customised?_
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for our systems. If you seek a different configuration than listed please contact us.

_Can I check your network?_
Yes, our LookingGlass can be found at [https://as62240.net/](https://as62240.net/info).

_How long for deployment?_
Our standard delivery is within 5 working days due to the current situation around the world.  Custom configurations may take longer.

_Do you offer IPMI Access?_
Yes, free VPN Secured IPMI access can be provided on request.

_Do you offer IPv6?_
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

_Can you accommodate x, y or z?_
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

_Any questions or queries?_
Contact our team today at [https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/)

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions [url=https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions](https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions). Cancellation notice period applies. Offer valid whilst promotional stocks last or until the 30th November 2020, whichever comes first.
